root_cause_description: FastAPI dependency is commented out in pyproject.toml
Import statement references non-existent module 'nonexistent_module'
pyproject.toml was modified but poetry.lock was not updated
Invalid Python syntax 'import invalid syntax here' at top of app.py
Dockerfile uses 'FORM' instead of 'FROM' instruction
YAML manifest contains invalid syntax 'invalid: yaml: syntax: here:'
Dockerfile has been removed from the repository
Dockerfile uses outdated Python 2.7 base image instead of 3.12
COPY command references non-existent path './nonexistent'
Test expects HTTP 500 instead of correct 200 status code
Code contains unused variable and excessive blank lines
Function return type annotation changed from dict to str incorrectly
Memory limits set too low (1Mi/2Mi) for application to run
Container port changed to 9999 instead of correct 8000
Kubernetes Service definition removed from manifest
Added pydantic-core ^1.0.0 which conflicts with pydantic ^2.0.0
Python version requirement set to 3.15-3.17 which doesn't exist
Entrypoint script entrypoint.sh has been removed
WORKDIR set to '/wrong/path' instead of '/app'
Router module imports from app which creates circular dependency
Dockerfile references undefined build argument UNDEFINED_ARG
Container configured to run as root user (security risk)
Application imports sys and calls sys.exit(1) immediately on startup
Service defines port 8000 twice with different target ports
Protocol field removed from port definition in manifest
Added uncovered functions that lower code coverage percentage
File contains multiple imports on single line 'import os
Test file test_app.py has been removed from test suite
Image tag references non-existent tag 'nonexistent-tag-12345'
Health check endpoint route removed from router configuration
CPU limits set too low (1m/2m) for application to function
Resource requests set to 256Gi memory and 250000m CPU exceeding quotas
Health check timeout set to 0 seconds which is invalid
Replica count set to 10000 exceeding available cluster resources
Added invalid environment variable INVALID_CONFIG with broken value
Health probe path changed to '/nonexistent' instead of '/health'
Service selector uses 'wrong-app-name' instead of 'fastapi-starter-python'
Kubernetes apiVersion set to 'v99' which doesn't exist
Deployment references non-existent namespace 'nonexistent-namespace'
imagePullPolicy set to 'InvalidPolicy' instead of valid value
Volume 'missing-volume' is defined but not mounted in container
maxSurge set to -1 and maxUnavailable set to 100 (invalid values)
Node affinity requires non-existent label 'nonexistent-label'
Init container configured to exit with code 1 (failure)
Environment variable references non-existent secret 'nonexistent-secret'
Environment variable references non-existent ConfigMap 'nonexistent-configmap'
Volume references non-existent PersistentVolumeClaim 'nonexistent-pvc'
Deployment restart policy set to 'Never' instead of 'Always'
Network policy denies all ingress and egress traffic
Resource requests (256Gi/512Gi memory
